text.more: The interactive network was created by Richard Lynch, Department of Agrifood Business and Spatial Analysis, Teagasc Ashtown Research Centre using the Gephi software (https://gephi.org/)
text.intro: Actors, represented by circular nodes, are segregated by the thematic area within which their primary interests lie (based on information provided by the Italian BovINE network manager). A line indicates that a relationship occurs between two actors within which knowledge and innovations can be shared. The thickness of the line between indicates the strength of the relationship between two actors.
text.title: Social network map illustrating the actors involved in the Beef knowledge and innovation network within Italy.
